display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.

**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=EBLPcbbfU5cQ7kNvwFtI5jp&_nc_oc=AdmJM41-py13TgQ4lP_vkIf_DJpSX0VwNguOl44Pfd8BviqCMLzSs1XevGLraYp7KGsegJGvPTbVsPR9nlY0DQ4H&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=nQCY7bGqm-cqWy2otSI7Xg&oh=00_AfGJF2RYoGoCbUTLZh3TghzVboWGodBD2LAGiQsnPkADRg&oe=681D279D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=BpCYzslqYG0Q7kNvwHLbeN1&_nc_oc=AdlxR8d26BlR0V4vCdUOyAI9sEiFJ9tYaqc7_bFf93mOvX3XReA0pQOdGvFcKg52UUitMmDY9xjWrkd3H7PFqyoq&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=nQCY7bGqm-cqWy2otSI7Xg&oh=00_AfGd8404nByNuZ3ZJXLI59tMH5YxFieyW5xCnSX90wrblQ&oe=681D4192)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=OLJBLu_9JWYQ7kNvwHD-xyY&_nc_oc=AdkayIgpi5VMB67fqpBlYobK5YNKasewfR_oN5AF0QVYpqmyEql1lVap6dLcqMg0OsOVyfX9LnD6yl-12ovAbN20&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=nQCY7bGqm-cqWy2otSI7Xg&oh=00_AfEz-2Ft9V18ru_y9J0M92wtSS6c8nVm5jVPncg6wyl0OQ&oe=681D0F63)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=lT6dH1hwoccQ7kNvwF4Qoy4&_nc_oc=Adl4gMXJ0oH3wiRE-Kp5TG1ZW6fLchO4Q6OATvHYmu_YEr6WE7KI7M7jQk7aPbJzQ_Pb2spXyl5fGZAIbNdSaF9e&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=nQCY7bGqm-cqWy2otSI7Xg&oh=00_AfFeYtl6aZlLoiiIsA7a0-NvFDqJfqiRTwo9O5xD29ebcw&oe=681D3E2E)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=0tNby1X_gjMQ7kNvwFCGzLj&_nc_oc=AdksoW3XuIkDl6tvX-QL7bsayf2VmlkQu_DDR27TP5ILhY1ZTiEvHji0Sc5Gl6HSLPIpZa1VMGLUxu-fMu6u9HRL&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=nQCY7bGqm-cqWy2otSI7Xg&oh=00_AfGFUAYXeu4uFqkvQmDlugpW6d9GWKLyzbaFhAZzDTd2iA&oe=681D0DD6)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
